1.title: Find Your Seat
1.description: Learn how to sit comfortably (chair, cushion, or floor).

2.title: Gentle Breathing
2.description: Focus on slow inhales & exhales (2–5 minutes).

3.title: Body Awareness
3.description: Scan your body from head to toe, release tension.

4.title: Counting the Breath
4.description: Count from 1 to 10 with each inhale/exhale cycle.

5.title: Anchor to the Present
5.description: Notice when your mind wanders, return to breath.

6.title: Guided Relaxation
6.description: Use short guided meditations to stay focused.

8.title: Noticing Thoughts
8.description: Watch thoughts without judgment, like clouds passing.

9.title: Gratitude Moment
9.description: End meditation by reflecting on one thing you're grateful for.

10.title: Build Consistency
10.description: Practice daily for at least 2 weeks before moving on.

11.title: Posture Refinement
11.description: Sit with alert yet relaxed spine.

13.title: Labeling Thoughts
13.description: Notice and name thoughts like 'thinking', 'planning', 'remembering', then return to breath.

14.title: Open Awareness
14.description: Notice sounds, sensations, and surroundings without reacting.

15.title: Loving-Kindness
15.description: Send kindness first to yourself, then to others.

16.title: Visualization
16.description: Picture calming imagery (forest, ocean, candle flame).

17.title: Walking Meditation
17.description: Sync slow walking with breath awareness.

18.title: Emotional Awareness
18.description: Observe emotions as sensations in body, not identity.

19.title: Mindful Pauses
19.description: Practice short meditations during daily activities.

20.title: 21-Day Routine
20.description: Practice 15–20 minutes daily with variety (breath, body, loving-kindness).

22.title: Breathless Awareness
22.description: Let go of controlling breath, observe naturally.

23.title: Choiceless Awareness
23.description: Open attention to everything without preference.

24.title: Deep Body Scan
24.description: Explore micro-sensations like tingling, warmth, vibration.

25.title: Mantra Meditation
25.description: Repeat a sacred word/sound (e.g., 'Om') to deepen focus.

26.title: Silence Practice
26.description: Meditate without guidance, no music, just awareness.

27.title: Shadow Work
27.description: Notice and accept difficult emotions or inner resistance.

28.title: Compassion Practice
28.description: Extend empathy even toward those who challenge you.

29.title: Non-Dual Awareness
29.description: Explore the sense of 'observer' dissolving into experience.

30.title: Retreat Practice
30.description: Try extended meditation (half-day, full-day, or weekend retreat).
